short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An add-on tool for publishers that provides enhanced functionality, a better experience, and customization options for JW websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An all-in-one tool for JW websites, providing enhanced functionality, customizable controls, and a more seamless interaction to help you engage with the content easily.


Key Features:
• Generate Links: Create a link for each selected text or media.
• Generate Various Items: Create and download QR codes for texts or media, and generate video transcripts for downloading or copying.
• Copy Text: Copy selected text or media timestamps with one click.
• Integration With Apps: Easily open website content in the app or the Online Library.
• Various Customizations: Customize subtitle styles, media player UI, and website width.
• Expand Functionality: Open content from the search bar or display citations for every article.

And many more great features. You can read more about all these features at jwpubs.org/addon.


How to Use:
Instructions are provided on the website at jwpubs.org/addon or within the root control of the add-on, explaining how each feature works.


Privacy and Security:
No personal data is collected or required for this extension. It is designed purely as a tool to enhance functionality, improve user experience, and provide customization options, requiring only minimal permissions to operate. Some features of this add-on require acceptance of the website's Privacy Policy to function correctly.


Note:
If a feature similar to one in this add-on is officially provided by the website, you can disable the corresponding feature using the root control to avoid conflicts. The next update of the add-on will eventually remove any redundant features.
